files.patch:
@@ -1300,5 +1300,0 @@ - * If the {@linkplain #byteSize()} of this segment is not evenly dividable by the - * number of octets used by provided {@code charset}, the reminding bytes of this - * segment is not accessed. For multi-octet charset, nulls are only detected on - * multi-octet-aligned boundaries. - *

@@ -1312,0 +1307,5 @@ + * @implNote If the {@linkplain #byteSize()} of this segment is not evenly dividable + * by the number of octets used by provided {@code charset}, the reminding + * bytes of this segment are not accessed. For multi-octet charset, + * {@code '\0'} terminator characters are only detected on + * multi-octet-aligned boundaries.
